modify_description: Modified step61: Replaced ExecutionAgent's text output with a run_code tool call using an invalid parameter (Path(None) instead of valid path string)
Tool returns TypeError due to invalid non-string path parameter
Subsequent steps reflect critical error, leading FinalAgent to infer unrelated root cause

Final answer changed from: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}} to: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "node-1", "root cause reason": "node CPU spike"}}
original_correct_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}}
wrong_final_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "node-1", "root cause reason": "node CPU spike"}}
causality_chain: step61: run_code uses invalid path parameter (None instead of valid path string) -> code execution TypeError -> agent concludes dataset is irrecoverably inaccessible -> FinalAgent infers wrong root cause (node CPU spike on node-1 instead of frontend-0 process termination)
